title: Should I try to learn Zed and or Yasuo?
body: Title says it all. Should I try to learn Yasuo, Zed, both, or just stick with tryndamere (who i'm suddenly doing HORRIBLE with, first two games were amazing, now im doing so bad suddenly)

replies.body: Don't play Yasuo, say no for your country.

Or.... a real champ?

But if I have to choose; Zed is the lesser of two evils. :P
Both are very fun champs, you get lots of kills, and who doesn't like having lots of kills.
Nah learn lee sin mate. Not enough people play the blind dude tbh.

> [{quoted}](name=Roguestoney,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=j8yWBH00,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-07-27T00:04:30.882+0000)
>
> Nah learn lee sin mate. Not enough people play the blind dude tbh.

lee sin? Bro,** full lethality garen** is where it's at. Easily one of the most challenging champions in the game, but very worth mastering.
lethality garen? what about adc malphite?
Zed has a higher chance of beating Yasuo.Once lvl 6, zed is rlly op. His ult makes sure of his opponents death

You probably won't get the opportunity to play either of them in ranked (depending on your elo). In most of my games, both Yas and Zed are banned almost every time. I'd recommend picking up champs that are strong and relatively uncommon. I picked up Heimerdinger a few years ago and have been playing him a lot. Especially after his rework. He's very, very strong and very uncommon. I think he has a 0.3% ban rate at the moment. You can still learn to play Yas and/or Zed, I just think you'll need other options because the opportunity to play either of them will be once in a blue moon.

I would probably learn Zed, or stick with Trynd. Trynd is cool. He is fairly straightforward and he can kick a bit of a$$. Both Zed and Yas are currently OP and have been for a while. I have no respect, personally, for people who play Yas. He is just broken. I find Zed a bit easier to play but it would vary for different people. Both classes are better than Trynd TBH but there are alot of scrubs playing both Zed and Yas and its not hard to get decent with Tyrnd and you should defeat a good number of those scrubs. If Yas is getting reworked then he will be nerfed. I personally dont find his mechanic fun either.
Stay the hell away from Yasuo, Zed is also op because of duskblade atm

Yasuo is getting reworked. Both are banned a lot (yasuo lower elo). Lethality is strong at the moment which factors zed. Yasuo is the most popular champ, and is overplayed.

Apart from that I personally enjoy zed more. Most importantly you have to enjoy playing them, and like their style/kit
